raw_body: SENADHIPATHI- SRIMA – (Retired Teacher – Ananda College,​ Colombo). Widow of Amarasena Senadhipathi (Surveyor),​ beloved mother of Dr Sujeewa,​ Bhathiya and Chathurika,​ loving mother-in-law of Dr Hemantha,​ Inoka and Prasanna,​ adored grandmother of Dr Hashan,​ Shehara,​ Linara and Anaali,​ passed away on January 29,​ 2024 after a brief illness. Cortege leaves the “Restpect”,​ Jayaratne Parlour on Tuesday,​ January 30,​ 2024 at 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.            006593
